divs: sighting detailsapprox. 00:45 edt on 7\25\2009, from my back yard, i saw an unusual orange light travelling south to north @ approx. 20 degrees elevation seemed flare a bit. it looked to be below the cloud cover and maintained a level flight for the 30 seconds i watched it. traveled from sse to ene from my perspective. visible from western wayne county in michigan (approx 25 miles west of detroit). i called the local police and was told there were no reports at the time and "we'll check it out". i'm looking for any similar observations.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Westland
There were no other sightings in Westland on or around July 25th 2009
